about_the_game:
Unlock 7 new irresistible outfits with a Kawaii twist to add to your girls’ collection.
Ranging from garter belts to fishnets and nipple tassles, these outfits will make your visits an even more thrilling experience.

This DLC contains 7 new outfits, available all clubs (Gentlemen’s Club, Utopia 2089, Tsuki Club)

content_descriptors.notes:
VR Paradise is a virtual striptease club that offers 3 types of sexual content:

- Pole-dances on stage with topless dancers.
- Table dances with close-up topless dancers.
- Performances in a private room during which the dancers undress completely (frontal depiction of the female genitals).

detailed_description:
Unlock 7 new irresistible outfits with a Kawaii twist to add to your girls’ collection.
Ranging from garter belts to fishnets and nipple tassles, these outfits will make your visits an even more thrilling experience.

This DLC contains 7 new outfits, available all clubs (Gentlemen’s Club, Utopia 2089, Tsuki Club)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7–7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
